name: UMovieSceneComponentMaterialParameterSection
doc: A movie scene section containing data for material parameters.

methods.name: AddColorParameterKey
methods.doc: Adds a a key for a specific color parameter at the specified time with the specified value.

methods.name: AddScalarParameterKey
methods.doc: Adds a a key for a specific scalar parameter at the specified time with the specified value.
